extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected System and Version
extracted_playbook.description: Verify if the system is affected by checking the PAN-OS version and configuration for GlobalProtect gateway or portal.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the system affected by the CVE?

extracted_playbook.title: Identify Exploitation Level
extracted_playbook.description: Follow the verification steps suggested by the vendor to determine the exploitation level of the device.

extracted_playbook.title: Update to Latest PAN-OS Hotfix
extracted_playbook.description: Apply the latest PAN-OS hotfix to mitigate the vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.title: Create Master Key and Elect AES-256-GCM
extracted_playbook.description: Create a master key and elect AES-256-GCM for encryption.

extracted_playbook.title: Engage Incident Response and Isolate Device
extracted_playbook.description: Engage incident response team and isolate the device to determine what was done on the device.

extracted_playbook.title: Update to Latest PAN-OS Hotfix and Perform Private Data Reset
extracted_playbook.description: After incident response, apply the latest PAN-OS hotfix and perform a Private Data Reset.

extracted_playbook.title: Engage Incident Response and Isolate Device
extracted_playbook.description: Engage incident response team and isolate the device to determine what was done on the device and in the network.

extracted_playbook.title: Update to Latest PAN-OS Hotfix and Perform Factory Reset
extracted_playbook.description: After incident response, apply the latest PAN-OS hotfix and perform a Factory Reset.

extracted_playbook.title: Enable Threat ID 95187
extracted_playbook.description: Enable Threat ID 95187 in Applications and Threats content version 8833-8682 to block attacks for this vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.title: Ensure Vulnerability Protection on GlobalProtect Interface
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure vulnerability protection is applied to the GlobalProtect interface to prevent exploitation.

extracted_playbook.title: Identify Indicators of Exploit Activity
extracted_playbook.description: Use the PAN-OS CLI command to identify indicators of exploit activity on the device.
commands: grep pattern "failed to unmarshal session(.\+.\/" mp-log gpsvc.log*
